column4: i upgraded to breezy and noticed that with right-click on the desktop i can't open a terminal anymore. is that the way it's supposed to be?
i also noticed that in the applications>systems tools menu, open terminal is gone, just open root terminal is there...
for the terminal it is an extra package let me check the name for you
alright, thanks, Il going to install it right away
it's a bit strange that i lost it with upgrading, no?
that doesn't seem to do the trick...
one question what is your window manager are you using the default gnome
let me try that right away
ask your question if someone know the answar will sure reply
your best bet is to remove it and re add it again
